description: The initiative, Casa Luker, aims to transform the cocoa value chain in Colombia by enhancing the livelihoods of cocoa-producing families. Established by Luker, a family-owned company, it focuses on sustainability through economic diversification, educational programs, and community engagement. The initiative promotes fair pricing, environmental practices, and social well-being, ensuring that cocoa farmers thrive while preserving their ecosystems. By collaborating with various stakeholders, it seeks to create shared value and long-term impact in rural communities.
name: Casa Luker
